website_summaries.verdict: The wooden train is a timeless classic that has stood the test of time, but this toy’s magnetic connectors, solid design, and premium paint are welcome improvements.
pros: Other characters like Victor and Percy available
cons: Doesn’t talk or make train sounds

customer_reviews.title: Not as described in the listing!
customer_reviews.text: This is supposed to be 5 inches x 4??? It is 3 x 1. This is NOT like the description. I needed it for a birthday cake and this is too small. So upset.
customer_reviews.author: Somerbabee

customer_reviews.title: Kids will love this train. Thomas enthusiasts less so.
customer_reviews.text: Every kid loves Thomas and this train is as solid as the others but I disappointed with the trend of these new trains. They are all the same size! Previously Gordon was much longer than other trains, now Percy is the same as Gordon who is the same as Thomas, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Selch

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Cute little wood Thomas train. Perfect for wooden train tracks. Has magnets so you can connect other train cars to him.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Cute but no magnet in the front
customer_reviews.text: This is soooo cute! My son enjoys taking the little guy out to put him inside other trains and vehicles he has. The only downside is that there's no magnet in the front of the car. My son likes to create trains and string them along for now (he's nearly 2 years old). It's fits perfectly on the wooden tracks, but the lack of magnet in the front makes it so he has to be in front of all over the other cars. As my son grows we will get my son to realize that Winston is a car and goes on the street instead. :)
customer_reviews.author: M. HieberTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Well...it's Thomas. What can you say?
customer_reviews.text: Thomas and friends are quite a cult, so you have to have it. And the books, of course. VERY happy to see Thomas is no longer limiting himself to male friends; we also bought Caitlin. (Not much in the books about the girls yet, so waiting on that.) All that aside, the quality of these is not as good as Brio, but probably sells more widely. It looks like the Thomas tracks are changing... maybe to differentiate from Brio and Brio knock-offs? Not sure how well that will work.
customer_reviews.author: Movin' southTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good but not Great
customer_reviews.text: Since it's the only choice out there for a wood Thomas train that works on Brio track it makes the purchase a no brainer. However, the quality is just shy of Brio standards. My daughter loves it and we'll more than likely be buying all his friends regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Jack R

customer_reviews.title: a tiny train
customer_reviews.text: this toy is rather small; based on the online description, I expected them to be somewhat larger. otherwise, the product seem to be of good quality and appropriate for little toddler hands.
customer_reviews.author: Sveta Walyon

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like the movie
customer_reviews.text: She's so darling! My 2 year old loves her and keeps trying to take her out everywhere. He recognizes her and pulls her out when every we play the movie she's in. Works great with ikea tracks
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful little train
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to get our youngest another train or two, and he was sitting with us when we pulled up the product page with all the options. When he saw Ashima he squealed, and that pretty much cemented it. It's a lovely little train with beautiful colors and designs. The body is made mainly of wood like the others in the Thomas & Friends collection. When she came, he joined her right up to the others - she even had a spot up front for a few days!
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Nice Ashima Toy but face doesn't match
customer_reviews.text: My 3 girls love Thomas and Friends, and ever since they saw "Thomas and the Great Race" they wanted an Ashima to add to their collection. I was happy to see that Amazon had this engine even though she has only come in that one video. My girls loved this toy, they also liked how she had a magnet which allowed her to connect to the other engines. Their only compliant was that the face in this engine, doesn't match the face of Ashima in the video, note to manufacturer, could you please fix that?
customer_reviews.author: JehanJ

customer_reviews.title: Great for little hands
customer_reviews.text: My son loves Thomas and enjoys the train. It is small enough it fits in his hands easily to move around. The train fits fairly neatly in the palm of my hand, it is slightly smaller than expected. Not that my 18 month old minds. It is durable and the wheels are well fixed on and not a concern for him to chew on or have dislodged. For those who are worried about it being a true to life replica of Thomas the tank engine, maybe miss the point of it being a kids toy, but that's just my thoughts.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: PRICE FACTOR.
customer_reviews.text: This a cartoon character every kid wants now a days. I know but i wish you could have kept the price around $2. its just a single piece. Your product would have sale triple then what is going now. Its a must have product for every kid who is a fan of thomas and friends. Overall its a good purchase just need the price to reduce a bit. thanks.
customer_reviews.author: IQ

customer_reviews.title: Best toys for Thomas fans!
customer_reviews.text: Love these little trains!! These have seriously been the best and toy of choice for my son. Since we bought Thomas, I have also purchased Diesel, Rosie & Percy. Very durable toy and yes they are a small but perfect for little hands. I read some people were complaining about the magnets not being strong enough. The magnets on all of our trains are great! If you have a Thomas fan in your house, these little guys are well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Fun character but not all wood
customer_reviews.text: My two year old was thrilled with this. Pros are that Sir Topham Hat comes out of the vehicle and bends at the waist and looks like Sir Topham Hat. Also Winston looks true to character, and this was a great price. Con was that only each end of Winston is wooden and the main base of the car is plastic. I must have missed this reading the description, so I was disappointed that it seemed lighter and less durable than older Thomas toys.
customer_reviews.author: AnnaC

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: We’ve always had the die cast versions for my older sons but they changed the connection and we didn’t like that they were not magnetic anymore so we ordered the wooden train set for my youngest and it has people and animals they’re much more durable than I would have thought wood would be. Very pleased. Would order more of this set for sure no questions.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed - a great addition to the Thomas and Friends Collection
customer_reviews.text: My son fell in love with the Thomas series, so it was time to get him some friends. These wooden trains are well built and hold up to all the crashes and scrapes they may encounter on the wooden rails. Full steam ahead!
customer_reviews.author: The Huntington Book Depository

customer_reviews.title: Solid wood, very well made
customer_reviews.text: This is surprisingly well made. It’s solid, perfectly and carefully painted, and quite substantial. There isn’t even much play in the wheels. It perfectly fits the Thomas trackMaster system and our Brio set as well. The magnets are even aligned properly to fit with other Brio trains. No small parts either. Very highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: My son flipped and it was the cutest thing ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES Thomas and Friends... I love that it's a wooden train. I'm hopeful to purchase the rest of the crew for his wooden train set. I will be more than happy to purchase from the seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Varian V.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a cake topper
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and perfect to use as a cake topper!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie L. Korn

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! Good size for toddler hands, the magnets make it easy to use with more Thomas trains but we had more magnetic trains of a generic type and they worked just fine!!’ A big plus for me, was that it’s wood, and I was able to nicely carve my son’s name on it for when he takes it with him to school.
customer_reviews.author: Yessica Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: My toddler loves Thomas!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler has several Thomas the Train characters but Thomas is his favorite. He even sleeps with it! Percy is his second favorite. I like this because I work in an office one day a week. These are easy to carry and they keep him busy so I can get some work done.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Very bright colors and well made
customer_reviews.text: My grandson LOVED this. He's 2, very into the wooden train sets and especially Thomas. I can't say for sure how long it will last but he's been carrying it around, rolling it down steps, playing in the wooden tracks wore a bit and it's holding up well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Very durable wooden train, not so strong magnets.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my son's favorite trains. It is very durable & has really survived some serious drops! One thing I noticed fairly on, the metal magnets at the front & back do not stick out very far. I don't think the magnet is very strong either, compared to other trains that he has, this Thomas' magnets frequently loses pull. The result is a very frustrated toddler & some tears.
customer_reviews.author: Roger that!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My son is a huge Thomas fan and lost his original Thomas to the evil lawn mower (oops). After drying his tears, he asked for a replacement for his Bday. When he got it, he thought we had glued it! Anyway, everything it could be. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Chaplin

customer_reviews.title: VERY small! NOT as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This wooden train is cute and appears to be durable. However, the train measures only 3 inches long from magnet to magnet 2 inches high A tad over 1 inch in width I bought it based on the stated size for what I needed it for ( part of a decoration for a baby shower). NOT happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Debonweb

customer_reviews.title: Fit on tracks and good magnet
customer_reviews.text: These are the “real” Thomas & friends trains. The magnetics are far superior than knockoff trains as this actually stays attached to the other trains with magnets. Theyre made from real wood and fit on the universa wooden tracks.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves it 🚃
customer_reviews.text: Its a win for me. The magnet works well with other trains. I love this product, my child loves it! I love the wooden detail the paint on it he's obsessed with Percy so I'm happy this is the best stocking stuffer christmas gift ever. #kidfriendly #momapproved
customer_reviews.author: Tash

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I grew up loving thomas and now my son does too. That's crazy. High quality toy. It gets its fair share of attention (a minute or two) before he moves on to other toys. It's held up great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Clark

customer_reviews.title: Go Thomas
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves Thomas and friends and he loves his Thomas. Even with his roughness Thomas is still all in one piece
customer_reviews.author: muneca1982

customer_reviews.title: son noted the difference from other trains
customer_reviews.text: love the train, great price. son noted that the funnel on the top did not stick up like his other trains and recommend that the next train he gets has that feature. he is 4 and notices the darndest things! ;)
customer_reviews.author: M.e.

customer_reviews.title: Great Percy!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves Thomas and all his many friends. Percy is a good quality wooden and plastic train car. She just loves him! Percy has held up well!
customer_reviews.author: Kim C. Gealy

customer_reviews.title: My son’s current favorite toy!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a good replica of thomas the train. My son loves the books and now loves playing with this train engine. It’s beautiful, well made and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Nish T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: A super cute toy! Perfect for travel and on the go. I added this train to a party favor bag for my son’s classmates to celebrate his 2nd birthday. It is definitely age appropriate!
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gift for the Thomas the train fan!
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for any Thomas the train fan! Got for my toddler for his birthday and he has a million of the trains so I wanted to change it up and he loved it!
customer_reviews.author: nick h

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It fits on our wood tracks and we like the magnet on the front and back. It hooks up to our existing set nicely. Thomas has a darling face (not creepy as some are lol). The body is wood and the wheels are plastic as described. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: His “hepacopter”
customer_reviews.text: What do you know, it’s a “hepacopter”, it does “hepacopter” things. The blade spins, as it should, and it is a clear representation of Thomas the train characters. The kiddo loves it, and that’s what matters.
customer_reviews.author: hadda.dream

customer_reviews.title: A gift for our nephew
customer_reviews.text: He loves all trains. This one looks great in the packaging and I have no reason to believe it won't be as good as the others we have purchased
customer_reviews.author: Casandra M. Cothran

customer_reviews.title: Built to last for years.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent craftsmanship. Posable figure is finely detailed for more realistic play. Sitting in my window seal waiting for grandchildren to come and play!
customer_reviews.author: Emma Jean Ingram

customer_reviews.title: A great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 yo grandson thinking it will be a long-cherished favorite. So far, I think that may be the case. He loves his trains.
customer_reviews.author: Keven R. Graves

customer_reviews.title: Thomas the train
customer_reviews.text: I guess I didn’t pay attention to the size listed...was a little smaller than expected. Good quality though
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great little tommy choo choo
customer_reviews.text: So far its love. A sturdy little wooden 'tommy choo choo' as my 2 year old calls him. Haha! He has been chosen several times as night time/naptime friend. A true spot of honor in our home. He also works well on the melissa and doug train tracks.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: They are great gifts.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these trains. I bought three of them for stocking stuffers. This is the only thing that he played with for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda D.

customer_reviews.title: Happy boy!
customer_reviews.text: My boy loves this train. It has endured his abuse and it's still going. Great for all train lovers!
customer_reviews.author: nitewish

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my two and a half year old son who loves Ashima. The train is very colorful and beautiful. My son was excited to get it and has played with it often.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Thomas the train is a nice LITTLE toy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice LITTLE toy for toddlers. I was really surprised to see how small it was when it arrived. BUT my grandson loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa M. C. Erie,PA

customer_reviews.title: Age appropriate size
customer_reviews.text: It's a good size for my three year old grandsons hands. Wonderful quality and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Big Foot

customer_reviews.title: Cute Thomas Train
customer_reviews.text: No complaints or things to concern. Product was as advertised and the kids loved him!
customer_reviews.author: PineappleJackspat

customer_reviews.title: Love the magnetic feature (don't have to worry about batteries)
customer_reviews.text: Love these wooden Thomas trains. The magnet hold works perfect with all his other wooden trains and it runs great on both his wooden train tracks and thomas tracks.
customer_reviews.author: N. DuFour

customer_reviews.title: a tiny train
customer_reviews.text: this toy is rather small; based on the online description, I expected them to be somewhat larger. otherwise, the product seem to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sveta Walyon

customer_reviews.title: fits with other thomas magnetic trains
customer_reviews.text: My boys love these wooden trains and they seem to hold up well. Fit with the other Thomas trains even the older ones and fit on the wooden tracks perfect.
customer_reviews.author: angelika

customer_reviews.title: Adorable toy for price
customer_reviews.text: My Grandsons love Thomas and his friends. They love the magnetic capability’s.
customer_reviews.author: FBowen

customer_reviews.title: Great toy/ cake topper
customer_reviews.text: Added this to my son's cake and made a great toy to add to his collection after.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Febles

customer_reviews.title: What's not to love
customer_reviews.text: My almost 3yo grandson is choo-choo obsessed. Rosie is a cutie. A nice addition to our growing collection.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Cat

customer_reviews.title: Made for a nice b-day present
customer_reviews.text: Needed a b-day present for a 2 year old. Delivery time was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Drakester

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: So cute! The little Sir Toppem Hat is adorable! A favorite with my son
customer_reviews.author: User HP

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: Love the toy, the quality, the package was awesome, no Nick's or broken pieces. Son was thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Well made, my son loves him
customer_reviews.text: Was pleasantly suprised he has a magnet on the bottom to pick things up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for “ Thomas and friends” fanatics!
customer_reviews.text: My son 3year old went crazy over this little Thomas. If your child enjoys “Thomas n friends” this is definitely worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Garcia

customer_reviews.title: It's a decent toy helicopter
customer_reviews.text: I mean it doesn't actually fly, lol. It's what you expect.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Always a hit. We love Thomas and friends. Good wood toy!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Erin

customer_reviews.title: Is smaller than u think ....
customer_reviews.text: Definitely smaller than it says not as described completely.... but my daughter loves it none the same
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: This is way smaller than I expected. I was thinking a bigger toy and it’s definitely not 5x4. It’s a cute little toy if you want a hot wheels looking toy train the length of your finger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gotta love Thomas
customer_reviews.text: Used it in a scene on top of a cake. It was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Small.
customer_reviews.text: I knew it was going to be small, but wow. Really small.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Lee

customer_reviews.title: Made very well
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this train. You cannot have a wooden train set without a Thomas. For the price, especially compared to retail stores, you cannot beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Brady Fam

customer_reviews.title: Great wooden train
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved this wooden Diesel. It was on sale for a great price & feels very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: G Sch

customer_reviews.title: The original
customer_reviews.text: This is the original Thomas for the old wooden tracks
customer_reviews.author: mdub1234

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and very similar to my son's 2010 Percy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Unfortunately my son Percy to accidental donation. This was a perfect low cost replacement.
customer_reviews.author: AMAZON CUSTOMER

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality ordered two by accident though my fault not anyone else’s
customer_reviews.author: Hopeiiann

customer_reviews.title: ALERT: Great deal on toys!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal on a Thomas wooden train? Sign me up every time!

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons LOVE this version of Thomas! 3 and 2 years old.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Thomas!
customer_reviews.text: Love these trains, durable and safe for the little ones! Great price.

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Son loved it, this is a hard train to find especially with Toys R US being gone.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Love having this to go with our other Thomas characters :)

customer_reviews.title: thomas
customer_reviews.text: Cute Thomas train that rolls well on the wooden tracks! Made our little guy super happy.
customer_reviews.author: cmj778

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this toy! Big hit and the same price as the new ones with less paint.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Great little train
customer_reviews.text: If you get it for under $10 it is a good deal. Kids love the character. Doesn't last long with rough play.
customer_reviews.author: montexan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Even though spring is here my grandon's favorite bedtime story is still Thomas gets a snow plow! He was overjoyed I picked him up from daycare and showed him Thomas! He will be four in April and loves trains.
customer_reviews.author: lynne

customer_reviews.title: My toddler loves it!
customer_reviews.text: As described. My son loves it and it works with his wooden tracks he already has from Melissa and Doug.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: The sturdiness is okay, and so is the durability. Although, the paint can chip away easily if you accidentally drop it or something. I love the face decal, and the blue paint and details are beautiful. I recommend this to ALL the Thomas And Friends fans.
customer_reviews.author: trang pham

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our Thomas toys
customer_reviews.text: My kids are pretty rough with their toys and this guys is holding up just fine. Very durable toy.

customer_reviews.title: Small and mighty!
customer_reviews.text: Small but my sone loves it. It is also quite durable. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Chadyan

customer_reviews.title: Description is misleading - says wood; received plastic
customer_reviews.text: The description and picture show a wooden Percy train, the one we received was plastic and not as the description listed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There is one, there is two, there is three, ther is four.
customer_reviews.text: Instant recognition and fun for my 20 month old grandson.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: The product was just as stated in description. My kids love it.

customer_reviews.title: Its was perfect
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for a stocking stuffer. Very please and it was well recieved. My little girl loved it as it is perfectly pink.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Percy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! The wooden (original) train is exactly what I was looking for.

customer_reviews.text: As described . My son loves Thomas and a great addition to his collection

customer_reviews.title: Well made and perfect size for little hands.
customer_reviews.text: If your child or grandchild watches Thomas the Train, he/she will love holding this mini train while watching! My granddaughter actually looks for the train each time she watches the show.

customer_reviews.text: It’s well built, reasonably similar to the real Thomas and my kid likes it

customer_reviews.title: Who measured this, a 2 year old???
customer_reviews.text: Gave this a 2 star only because it is NOT AS DESCRIBED. Not sure who they gave the measuring tape to when it came to the dimensions but the true dimensions are 1 1/2 inches wide, 2 inches tall and 3 inches long.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality... my 2 year old loves it! It doesn't work very well with our cheapie train set tracks, but he enjoys carrying it around!

customer_reviews.text: What you would expect to receive with the classic Thomas the Train

customer_reviews.title: A great improvement
customer_reviews.text: This version of Thomas is a much better version over 2018's unpainted model. It may not be The original Thomas wooden railway but it is an improvement and I will have fun filming with it.

product_meta.title: Thomas & Friends Fisher-Price Wood, Thomas
feature_bullets: Thomas & Friends Wood toy train is compatible with redesigned Thomas & Friends Wood track and classic Thomas & Friends Wooden Railway track (sold separately and subject to availability)
Magnet connectors allow train to connect to other trains and cargo cars (sold separately and subject to availability)
Thomas & Friends train play helps encourage imagination, motor skills and thinking skills
